_header: A child is born amongst man
_description: A Christmas carol — three stanzas with a 4-line burden: ‘Honnd by honnd we schulle ous take / & joye & blisse schulle we make / For the deuel of ele man haght forsake / & godes sone ys maked our make’

Bod26.First Lines:
A child is boren amo[n]ges man& in þat child was no
                    wam…
Bod26.Last Lines:
…for þe he ȝahf a hondre fo[l]dhys lif to
                    bote
